mdRecord.dcterms:title: Scarificator in case
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The scarificator has 16 blades; the case is made of cardboard covered in leather, with tooling designs in the leather
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
Donated by Professor & Mrs. Ralph J. Stoudt, Jr. in honor of Elizabeth Heinrich Johnson Thomson, the grandmother of Professor Stoudt [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus
